description: Triangles with integer-length sides and perimeter n, not isomorphic to any triangle with integer-length sides and perimeter<n.
example: There are 3 triangles with integer-length sides and perimeter 9: 1-4-4, 2-3-4, 3-3-3. 3-3-3 is omitted because isomorphic to 1-1-1, so a(9)=2.
author: _Neil Fernandez_
extensions: Corrected and extended with formula by _Christian G. Bower_, Nov 15 1999.
